Pearl Graff

  1. Foster Name: Pearl
  2. Foster Family: Edward D. and Martha Morris
  3. Location of Family: Dawson, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Falls City, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 12
  7. Date of Birth: 1903-01-31
  8. Gender: female
  9. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Falls City Journal, 27 March 1915; 1920 United States Federal Census; Eloise Thomsen Corres.; History of Richardson County, Nebraska, pt 2, p. 1099.
